I enjoyed staying here for a 9 day solo vacation. The location of the unit is steps away from a walkway to the beach, and a short stroll away from a small pool. (There’s also a much larger pool on the property.) The closest entrance to the condo does have a short flight of stairs. Grocery stores/restaurants are nearby, and there’s a bar and restaurant on site.
The condo is comfortable, well-equipped, and generally quiet, though the sound of the wind can be audible at night. The view of the ocean from the balcony was a highlight of my stay! (Note: BYO pantry basics like oil, spices, tea, etc.) The mattress is on the softer side, but the blackout shades were great. Whenever I had questions, Chad communicated promptly and quickly resolved minor issues. He provides very thorough info/directions (ex. beach towels aren’t provided). Please take the time to read them before you come, so there are no surprises. I had such a wonderful trip that I’m already dreaming of my next getaway!

Natural beach is great if you enjoy exploring, seeing various sea creatures (hermit crabs, blue crabs, horseshoe crabs, several fish, and a few dolphins spotted in the distance, and tons of coastal birds). We switched back and forth during our stay. When the tide is low, the water goes out very far, so it’s easy to spread out.

Everything here is just as described in the listing. The horizon view of the ocean was nice while eating breakfast out on the balcony. The unit is literally a few steps away from the boardwalk that leads out onto the beach. Everything we needed was provided, especially in the kitchen, so while there are lots of nice restaurants, we were able to cook our own meals as well. One thing I really liked was the fact that the front windows are covered at this unit. Other units have a wide window in the middle of the front room and one of those vertical skinny windows next to the door. Unfortunately, the way these resort rooms are, the bedroom is that front room next to the door. I see other units in this resort complaining that there's way too much light due to the lighting, but not ours! We had a nice, pitch-black bedroom, and for that I was grateful.
The provided beach chairs, umbrella, umbrella anchors, etc allowed us to have a great time on the beach. They provided many amenities, so we had things like K-cup makers, toaster, many pots and pans, tupperware, tons of cooking utensils. Paper towels, toilet paper, basic toiletries, all provided. We stayed for two weeks so we went through the initial load and bought our own refills but if you're only staying the weekend it should be more than you need.
This made for a great honeymoon and we're grateful to our hosts for a good stay.

review_text:
Stayed here for a family beach vacation and the place was great. The property is located right on the beach and has a nice outdoor pool. The best amenity though turned out to be the clubhouse, which has a gym and an indoor pool with hot tub and sauna. We had a couple of days of chilly beach weather and the indoor pool saved the day.
The unit itself was nice. Both bedrooms have clear views of the pool and beach. Both bedrooms also have outdoor balconies. They are perfectly positioned to see the sun rise. All appliances and televisions in working order.
Would highly recommend staying here.

review_text: Suzanne’s condo was an AMAZING stay for my family. First off, the condo’s location is prime beach front access. We loved being on the first floor, with an easy elevator ride or a quick flight of stairs to access it. We had wonderful ocean and pool views. We were always able to find parking directly underneath our unit which was easy access for us. The condo’s layout was perfect for two couples and an infant. We were on separate ends which allowed for privacy but then when we wanted to meet in the living room, was so cozy. The kitchen and living room was the perfect space for all of us to hang out. The condo was extremely clean, comfy beds, and exactly as photos show. The location of the condo is also a great location to visit north or south of the island. I highly recommend Suzanne’s condo if you are looking for a visit to Hilton Head Island! She was fast to respond, provided so much information for our stay, and accommodated us so well. Thank you again! We will be back!

review_text: This was our first trip to Hilton Head and we absolutely loved it! Beautiful resort and condo! We booked Suzanne’s Airbnb because of the great views overlooking the pool and ocean. It did not disappoint! We enjoyed the sunrises & sunsets right from the balcony or with a short walk to the beach! The condo was clean and nicely updated. Great location! We were able to visit Old Town Bluffton, Daufuskie Island and Savannah during our stay. Tons of restaurants in the area and plenty to do! Suzanne was very responsive from start to finish! The “Guidebook” link was a big help….very professional! We will definitely be back!
